title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, objectives, timeline, and resource allocation. Set up project management tools and communication channels.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct stakeholder interviews, analyze existing systems, and document functional and non-functional requirements for the deception technology.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, and data flows. Propose AI models and algorithms for creating and managing decoys, incorporating generative adversarial networks (GANs), reinforcement learning, and anomaly detection. Discuss scalability, fault tolerance, security (e.g., secure enclaves, data encryption), performance requirements, integration with existing security tools and processes (e.g., SIEM, IDS/IPS), and deployment strategies (e.g., cloud, on-premises). Outline monitoring, maintenance, and error handling procedures, considering edge cases and performance optimizations. Clarify dependencies on 'Requirements Gathering and Analysis' and any other potential dependencies.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema for storing and managing decoy data, attacker behavior, logs, and other relevant information. Consider edge cases such as high concurrency, varying data sizes, and potential data anomalies. Data models should include decoy configurations, attacker profiles, attack patterns, and analytics. Ensure scalability, performance, security best practices, and data integrity. Incorporate encryption and access control mechanisms for sensitive data. Define data retention policies, backup strategies, and disaster recovery plans. Ensure compliance with relevant data privacy and security regulations, including GDPR and HIPAA.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface for managing and monitoring the deception technology, including dashboards and reporting tools.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the core functionality of the deception technology, including AI models, decoy management, and attacker behavior analysis.

title: Security and Penetration Testing
description: Perform security audits, vulnerability assessments, and penetration testing to ensure the robustness and resilience of the deception technology.

title: Integration and System Testing
description: Integrate the frontend, backend, and database components. Perform end-to-end system testing to validate functionality and performance.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the deception technology to production environments. Set up monitoring and logging systems for performance tracking and incident response.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user guides, technical manuals, and training materials for administrators and analysts.
